title: When I Decided I Won't Be Friends with Oliver Anymore
subtitle: So That's What "Not Holding a Grudge" Means!
description:

When hurt feelings turn heavy, one child learns that real strength isn't in winning â€¦ it's in forgiving. Through playful scenes and a whisper of God's voice, readers see that the Father never keeps score; He simply says, "Let's start again."
